verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Send <S%H7971><s%> you men <S%H582><s%>, that they may search <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, which I give <S%H5414><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: of every <S%H376><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall you send <S%H7971><s%> a man <S%H259><s%>, every one a ruler among them <S%H5387><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> by the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%>: all those men <S%H582><s%> were <S%H1992><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And these were their names <S%H8034><s%>: of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Shammua <S%H8051><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hori <S%H2753><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, Igal <S%H3008><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, Oshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, Palti <S%H6406><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Raphu <S%H7505><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, Gaddiel <S%H1427><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sodi <S%H5476><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, namely <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, Gaddi <S%H1426><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Susi <S%H5485><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, Ammiel <S%H5988><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gemalli <S%H1582><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, Sethur <S%H5639><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael <S%H4317><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, Nahbi <S%H5147><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Vophsi <S%H2058><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, Geuel <S%H1345><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machi <S%H4352><s%>.

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy out <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Oshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> Jehoshua <S%H3091><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them to spy out <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H5927><s%>, Get you up this way southward <S%H5045><s%>, and go up <S%H5927><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%>:

And see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, what it is <S%H5971><s%>; and the people that dwells <S%H3427><s%> in it <S%H2389><s%>, whether they be strong or weak <S%H7504><s%>, few <S%H4592><s%> or many <S%H7227><s%>;

And what the land <S%H776><s%> is that they live in <S%H3427><s%>, whether it be good <S%H2896><s%> or bad <S%H7451><s%>; and what cities <S%H5892><s%> they be that they live <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H2007><s%>, whether in tents <S%H4264><s%>, or in strong holds <S%H4013><s%>;

And what the land <S%H776><s%> is <S%H8082><s%>, whether it be fat or lean <S%H7330><s%>, whether there be <S%H3426><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> in it <S%H2388><s%>, or not. And be you of good courage, and bring <S%H3947><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>. Now the time <S%H3117><s%> was the time <S%H3117><s%> of the first ripe <S%H1061><s%> grapes <S%H6025><s%>.

So they went up <S%H5927><s%>, and searched <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> unto Rehob <S%H7340><s%>, as men come <S%H935><s%> to Hamath <S%H2574><s%>.

And they ascended <S%H5927><s%> by the south <S%H5045><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto Hebron <S%H2275><s%>; where Ahiman <S%H289><s%>, Sheshai <S%H8344><s%>, and Talmai <S%H8526><s%>, the sons <S%H3211><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>, were <S%H2275><s%>. (Now Hebron was built <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Zoan <S%H6814><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.)

And they came <S%H935><s%> unto the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> from there a branch <S%H2156><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> cluster <S%H811><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%>, and they bore <S%H5375><s%> it between two <S%H8147><s%> upon a staff <S%H4132><s%>; and they brought of the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>, and of the figs <S%H8384><s%>.

The place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, because of <S%H182><s%> the cluster of grapes <S%H811><s%> which the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cut down from there <S%H3772><s%>.
And they returned <S%H7725><s%> from searching <S%H8446><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> after <S%H7093><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And they went <S%H3212><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and to Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and to all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%>, to Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>; and brought back <S%H7725><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> unto them <S%H5712><s%>, and unto all the congregation, and showed <S%H7200><s%> them the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And they told <S%H5608><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said, We came <S%H935><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> where you sent <S%H7971><s%> us <S%H2100><s%>, and surely it flows with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>; and this is the fruit of it <S%H6529><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H657><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> be strong <S%H5794><s%> that live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and the cities <S%H5892><s%> are walled <S%H1219><s%>, and very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%>: and moreover we saw <S%H7200><s%> the sons <S%H3211><s%> of Anak there <S%H6061><s%>.

The Amalekites <S%H6002><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%>: and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, live <S%H3427><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and by the coast <S%H3027><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> stilled <S%H2013><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> before Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Let us go up <S%H5927><s%> at once <S%H5927><s%>, and possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3201><s%>; for we are well able to overcome it <S%H3201><s%>.

But the men <S%H582><s%> that went up <S%H5927><s%> with him said <S%H559><s%>, We be not able <S%H3201><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> against the people <S%H5971><s%>; for they are stronger than we <S%H2389><s%>.

And they brought up <S%H3318><s%> an evil report <S%H1681><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> which they had searched <S%H8446><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The land <S%H776><s%>, through which we have gone <S%H5674><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> it <S%H776><s%>, is a land that eat up <S%H398><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H5971><s%>; and all the people that we saw <S%H7200><s%> in it <S%H8432><s%> are men <S%H582><s%> of a great stature <S%H4060><s%>.

And there we saw <S%H7200><s%> the giants <S%H5303><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>, which come of the giants <S%H5303><s%>: and we were in our own sight <S%H5869><s%> as grasshoppers <S%H2284><s%>, and so we were in their sight <S%H5869><s%>.
